name: Ice Block Breaker Free - Cool Penguin Ice Theme Game That Is Fun To Play
name_original: Ice Block Breaker Free - Cool Penguin Ice Theme Game That Is Fun To Play
description:
Ice Block Breaker is a classic breakout style game with a cool penguin ice theme. Collect the falling items released from the ice blocks for extra points and its power up ability if it has one. As you progress in the game the levels will become increasingly more difficult. The next level is unlocked when the current one is completed.

+ Cool Penguin Ice Theme
+ Bonus Ball PowerUp
+ Ammo PowerUp
+ Collect Falling Items For More Points
+ Big Paddle PowerUp
+ Small Paddle PowerUp
+ Freeze Paddle PowerUp
+ Fun For Everyone
